body: Ah, that was an accident during a recent change. I'll push out 1.0.3 with it fixed.
The first tagged commit is not relevant, only the second.
but LottieDrawable is still package visible in v1.0.3 ?
@microstudent LottieDrawable is public in 1.0.3. You can see it in the commit that is linked above in this issue.

@gpeal Haven't it sync to Maven or something?
 I can't see this change when I use compile 'com.airbnb.android:lottie:1.0.3'

@microstudent Ah, you know, the constructor wasn't made public :(
You can use 1.0.1 or reflection for now. I'm going to push a significant update this week and will fix it properly.

issue.title: Make LottieComposition properties getters public

repository.name: lottie-android
repository.description: Render After Effects animations natively on Android and iOS, Web, and React Native
